body:
This is the pocket-loverâ€™s tote! It includes four outside pockets in eucalyptus-printed felt. Fits a laptop or tablet in addition to all of the essentials.

I print each of these bags with eucalyptus leaves -- no other dyes, the leaves alone create these colors! Eucalyptus is lightfast on wool and should not fade over time. The felt is the highest density of industrial wool felt; it may pill slightly during the first week or so of wear, but simply remove pills with a lint remover (or your fingers) and this should soon subside. Includes all brass hardware.

For cleaning, a lint roller is your best friend. You may spot clean with water and gentle detergent, but do not submerge in water. Indigo is a physical bond with wool and will fade slightly over time.

Approximate dimensions: 15 inches wide x 13 inches tall x 3 inches deep.
name: AZ0067-003 Medium Felt Tote - Eucalyptus
